org.embulk.util.rubytime

Interface RubyDateTimeParsedElementsQuery.MillisecondConverter

  • Enclosing class:
    RubyDateTimeParsedElementsQuery<T>

    public static interface RubyDateTimeParsedElementsQuery.MillisecondConverter
    A converter for millisecond to be stored as the required type in the result Map.

    For example, the following implementation converts millisecond into Ruby's Rational object in JRuby. 

    
 import org.jruby.Ruby;
 import org.jruby.RubyRational;

 public class MillisecondToRationalConverter implements RubyDateTimeParsedElementsQuery.MillisecondConverter {
     public MillisecondToRationalConverter(final Ruby ruby) {
         this.ruby = ruby;
     }

     public Object convertMillisecond(final long millisecond) {
         return RubyRational.newRationalCanonicalize(this.ruby.getCurrentContext(), millisecond, 1000L);
     }

     private final Ruby ruby;
 }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object convertMillisecond(long millisecond)
      Converts millisecond in long into an arbitrary Object to be stored in the result Map of RubyDateTimeParsedElementsQuery.

        Returns:
        an arbitrary Object to be stored in the result Map, not null
